_header: To Christ Jesu that Lord and King
Subjects: carols, of the Trinity; Christ, burial and resurrection
_description: James Ryman, a song of the Passion and Resurrection — five quatrains (aaab) with ‘Te deum’ refrain and burden: ‘Te patrem inuocamus / Te deumque laudamus’

CULEe112.First Lines:
To Crist Ihesu thatte lorde and kyngOf whois kyngdome is none
                    endyng…
CULEe112.Last Lines:
…To heuen blisse thatt lastith ayTe deum
                    laudamus
